original_text: Jesus then said, ‘When a bad spirit goes out of a person, it travels through dry places. It looks for a new place to live. But maybe it does not find anywhere. So it says to itself, “I will return to the place where I lived before.”
korean_text: 더러운 귀신이 사람에게서 나갔을 때에 물 없는 곳으로 다니며 쉬기를 구하되 얻지 못하고 이에 이르되 내가 나온 내 집으로 돌아가리라 하고

sentences.original_text: When a bad spirit goes out of a person
sentences.korean_translation: 악한 영이 한 사람에게서 나갈 때

sentences.original_text: It looks for a new place to live
But maybe it does not find anywhere
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 어디도 찾지 못할 수도 있다

sentences.original_text: I will return to the place
